items.title: American Airlines shares tumble as outlook falls short
items.description: American forecast a wider than expected loss for the first quarter, sending shares lower.

items.title: EA shares plunge 19%, on track for worst day since dot-com bubble
items.description: Electronic Arts shares plummeted on Thursday after the video game publisher cut its forecast, due largely to challenges with its soccer franchise.

items.title: SK Hynix profit soars to a record high on AI boom, but shares drop on demand uncertainty
items.description: SK Hynix CFO Kim Woohyun said that the outlook for memory demand in 2025 was clouded by inventory adjustments, protective trade policies and geopoliti...

items.title: Netflix shares soar as company reports surging revenue, tops 300 million subscribers
items.description: The fourth quarter was the last for which Netflix will report quarterly paid subscriber counts.

items.title: EA shares drop 7% after company lowers guidance due to weakness in soccer, other games
items.description: Electronic Arts slashed its full-year guidance on Wednesday, blaming the shortfall on underperforming games, in particular, its soccer franchise.
